abstract: Two Securities and Exchange Commission employees are under investigation by the F.B.I. for allegedly using insider information to trade stocks, CBS News reported.
snippet: Two Securities and Exchange Commission employees are under investigation by the F.B.I. for allegedly using insider information to trade stocks, CBS News reported.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:13 p.m. The investigation has been confirmed by the office of Senator Charles Grassley, Republican of Iowa.

headline.main: Authorities Investigate Insider Trading At S.E.C.
